attributes.action: Cap the price of train fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rail network has drastically improved over the last decade but at the expense of escalating fares well above inflation. I drive as it is more cost effective than using the train. Train fares should be capped by the government to entice people to use them and not their cars, thus reducing congenstion and green house gas emissions.
